post:
http://www.hostforless.net/

Host For Less is a sub brand of Frixel Solutions LLC, a registered Oregon company located in California. Host For Less combines super low pricing with tons of storage for all your web projects. Location-wise your hosting account could get deployed anywhere in the US since we will be snatching up on sale dedis from reputable providers as they go on sale or are in stock at low prices. Currently we are starting with servers from Wholesale Internet.

http://www.hostforless.net/

Features include cPanel, Softaculous, CloudLinux, and Free SSL through Let's Encrypt!

http://www.hostforless.net/


**Plans & Pricing**

H1 - 10G HDD/200G BW - $7.99/yr ($7.19 with coupon) - [Order Link](https://www.frixelsolutions.com/secure/cart.php?a=add&pid=44)


H2 - 20G HDD/400G BW - $12.99/yr ($11.69 with coupon) - [Order Link](https://www.frixelsolutions.com/secure/cart.php?a=add&pid=45)


H3 - 30G HDD/800G BW - $17.99/yr ($16.19 with coupon) - [Order Link](https://www.frixelsolutions.com/secure/cart.php?a=add&pid=46)

**Special Offer**

10% Off Recurring with Promo Code _HOSTFORLESS-10PERCENT-LET_

**Notes**

Please check TOS: http://www.hostforless.net/termspolicies.html No SPAM, no adult

Download test file: http://www.unmanagedhosting.net/speedtest/128MB.test

Manual order verification - setup within 24 hours.

http://www.hostforless.net/
